SEARCH
Module io.jstach.rainbowgum.slf4j
Package io.jstach.rainbowgum.slf4j.spi

Interface LoggerDecoratorService.DepthAwareEventBuilder

All Superinterfaces:
LoggingEventBuilder
Enclosing class:
LoggerDecoratorService
public static interface LoggerDecoratorService.DepthAwareEventBuilder extends LoggingEventBuilder
Because wrapping can change the depth of the logger in the callstack this interface allows implementations to change the depth of the event builder.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    LoggingEventBuilder
    setDepth(int depth)
    Sets the depth of an event builder.
    static LoggingEventBuilder
    setDepth(LoggingEventBuilder eventBuilder, int depth)
    Will recreate the logger with desired depth if possible.
    LoggingEventBuilder

    Redirects the output.

  • Method Details

    • setDepth

      LoggingEventBuilder setDepth(int depth)
      Sets the depth of an event builder.
      Parameters:
      depth - sets depth for caller info.
      Returns:
      this.

    • setDepth

      static LoggingEventBuilder setDepth(LoggingEventBuilder eventBuilder, int depth)
      Will recreate the logger with desired depth if possible.
      Parameters:
      eventBuilder - event builder to check.
      depth - new depth.
      Returns:
      logger with new depth or the same logger if not possible.

      Returns:
